comments.body: I've opened a PR upstream to include the license file in the source distribution (https://github.com/casact/chainladder-python/pull/102). Please add a similar comment as described in my comment about the other recipe.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@  license: MPL-2.0
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/casact/chainladder-python/pull/102
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:

comments.body: Just note that while the CI in staged recipes will handle building `xlcompose` before trying to build this package, when the feedstock is created, this build might fail because there is a time before `xlcompose` will show up on the conda-forge CDN. If that happens we will need to restart the CI when it's available.
understood.  Thank you for the review and help @synapticarbors.

I've opened a PR upstream to include the license file in the source distribution (https://github.com/casact/chainladder-python/pull/102). Please add a similar comment as described in my comment about the other recipe.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@  license: MPL-2.0
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/casact/chainladder-python/pull/102
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:

comments.body: Just note that while the CI in staged recipes will handle building `xlcompose` before trying to build this package, when the feedstock is created, this build might fail because there is a time before `xlcompose` will show up on the conda-forge CDN. If that happens we will need to restart the CI when it's available.
understood.  Thank you for the review and help @synapticarbors.
